creator: Jodi365.com
descriptionHtml:
Jodi365 is not the typical matrimonial site. It is not a casual dating app, either.

Rather, it is a next-generation matchmaking platform that helps quality singles to find the right match—whether they are ready for marriage in the near term or want to get to know someone as friends first.

What differentiates Jodi365 from the various matrimony sites and Indian dating apps out there:
• Jodi365 caters to quality singles – and is designed to weed out riff-raff!
• Clear relationship goals and time frames – no need to guess a match's intentions
• No frivolous browsing here – we don't indulge "time-pass" seekers
• Unmatched privacy safeguards – no competing app takes privacy more seriously
• Review mutually suitable matches – no need to search endlessly!
• We match people, not merely "bio data" – and help to ensure true compatibility
• Guided interactions with matches – no more wondering what to say!
• Use SecureDial™ to talk to matches – without ever exposing your phone number
• Going beyond matchmaking – to help people nurture and celebrate relationships

About the size of our user base:
Jodi365 has been live since mid-2011. We long focused more on understanding the needs and preferences of quality singles and less on chasing vanity metrics such as the number of signups, more so in a business with inherently high churn. That said, we are growing briskly, having recently rolled out a re-built, scalable version 7 of the platform, and are excited about introducing Jodi365 to millions of quality singles in the near future.

Jodi365 is a "freemium" platform. What that means:
There are basic things that you can do on the platform for free. Value-added services are provided at additional cost.

Here's what all you can do for FREE:
• Keep your name, email, phone number, and some sensitive profile information (e.g., date of birth, income, college, place of employment, and smoking/drinking habits) from being exposed to web search engines and any other user on the platform
• Keep your photos from being exposed to web search engines (for ever) and also blurred out to other users as desired
• Find and review suitable matches
• View prospects' photos if their privacy settings allow it
• Shortlist and express interest in matches
• Send a SecureDial™ request to potential matches
• Reply to questions and messages sent by matches who have upgraded to a subscription plan
• Receive customer support via email or live chat

Value-added services start at ₹999 – for a Quick Connect plan, which allows you to initiate chat with matches. We also offer personalized services through an Assisted Connect plan.

Want to find someone from your own socio-cultural background?:
Jodi365 appeals to people of diverse religious views, whether it is Hindu, Muslim, Christian, Sikh, Jain, Buddhist, Parsi, or even no religion. Our users also come from various cultures, including: Bengali, Hindi, Gujarati, Kannadiga, Malayalee, Marathi, Oriya, Punjabi, Tamil, Telugu, and multi-cultural backgrounds.

One common denominator in our users, regardless of their socio-cultural background, is that they are drawn to Jodi365's tag line: For quality singles!

For more information, please browse https://www.jodi365.com or call us at +91 934 JODI 365 (India) / +1 305 JODI 365 (USA).
descriptionShort: Join the best alternative to matrimonial and dating apps. Get matched for free.

New users can confirm that they are a real person, by taking a one-time, secure, 5s selfie video. The video won't be displayed in their profiles. Only a Video-Verified badge will be displayed, increasing matches' trust in the authenticity of the profile.

It's another step in our caring to ensure that you see only real, quality profiles on Jodi365.

title: Jodi365: Indian matchmaking done right, since 2011

creator: Jodi365.com
descriptionHtml:
Jodi365 is not the typical matrimonial site. It is not a casual dating app, either.

Rather, it is a next-generation matchmaking platform that helps quality singles to find the right match—whether they are ready for marriage in the near term or want to get to know someone as friends first.

What differentiates Jodi365 from the various matrimony sites and Indian dating apps out there:
• Jodi365 caters to quality singles – and is designed to weed out riff-raff!
• Clear relationship goals and time frames – no need to guess a match's intentions
• No frivolous browsing here – we don't indulge "time-pass" seekers
• Unmatched privacy safeguards – no competing app takes privacy more seriously
• Review mutually suitable matches – no need to search endlessly!
• We match people, not merely "bio data" – and help to ensure true compatibility
• Guided interactions with matches (SOON) – no more wondering what to say!
• Use SecureDial™ to talk to matches – without ever exposing your phone number
• Going beyond matchmaking – to help people nurture and celebrate relationships

About the size of our user base:
Jodi365 has been live since mid-2011. We long focused more on understanding the needs and preferences of quality singles and less on chasing vanity metrics such as the number of signups, more so in a business with inherently high churn. That said, we are growing briskly, having recently rolled out a re-built, scalable version 7 of the platform, and are excited about introducing Jodi365 to millions of quality singles in the near future.

Jodi365 is a "freemium" platform. What that means:
There are basic things that you can do on the platform for free. Value-added services are provided at additional cost.

Here's what all you can do for FREE:
• Keep your name, email, phone number, and some sensitive profile information (e.g., date of birth, income, college, place of employment, and smoking/drinking habits) from being exposed to web search engines and any other user on the platform
• Keep your photos from being exposed to web search engines (for ever) and also blurred out to other users as desired
• Find and review suitable matches
• View prospects' photos if their privacy settings allow it
• Shortlist and express interest in matches
• Send a SecureDial™ request to potential matches
• Reply to questions and messages sent by matches who have upgraded to a subscription plan
• Receive customer support via email or live chat

Value-added services start at ₹1,999 – for a Quick Connect plan, which allows you to initiate chat with matches. We also offer personalized services through an Assisted Connect plan.

Want to find someone from your own socio-cultural background?:
Jodi365 appeals to people of diverse religious views, whether it is Hindu, Muslim, Christian, Sikh, Jain, Buddhist, Parsi, or even no religion. Our users also come from various cultures, including: Bengali, Hindi, Gujarati, Kannadiga, Malayalee, Marathi, Oriya, Punjabi, Tamil, Telugu, and multi-cultural backgrounds.

One common denominator in our users, regardless of their socio-cultural background, is that they are drawn to Jodi365's tag line: For quality singles!

For more information, please browse https://www.jodi365.com or call us at +91 934 JODI 365 (India) / +1 305 JODI 365 (USA).

title: Jodi365: Indian matchmaking done right, since 2011

creator: Jodi365.com
descriptionHtml:
Jodi365 is not the typical matrimonial site. It is not a casual dating app, either.

Rather, it is a next-generation matchmaking platform that helps quality Indian singles to find the right match—whether they are ready for marriage in the near term or want to get to know someone as friends first.

What differentiates Jodi365 from the various matrimony sites and Indian dating apps out there:
• Jodi365 caters to quality singles – and is designed to weed out riff-raff!
• Clear relationship goals and time frames – no need to guess a match's intentions
• No frivolous browsing here – we don't indulge "time-pass" seekers
• Unmatched privacy safeguards – no competing matchmaking app takes privacy more seriously
• Review mutually suitable matches – no need to search endlessly!
• We match people, not merely profiles – and help to ensure true compatibility
• Guided interactions with matches (SOON) – no more wondering what to say!
• Use SecureDial™ to talk to matches – without ever exposing your phone number
• Going beyond matchmaking – to help people nurture and celebrate relationships

About the size of our user base:
Jodi365 has been live since mid-2011. We long focused more on understanding the needs and preferences of quality singles and less on chasing vanity metrics such as the number of signups, more so in a business with inherently high churn. That said, we are growing briskly, having recently rolled out a re-built, scalable version 7 of the platform, and are excited about introducing Jodi365 to millions of quality singles in the near future.

Jodi365 is a "freemium" platform. What that means:
There are basic things that you can do on the platform for free. Value-added services are provided at additional cost.

Here's what all you can do for FREE:
• Keep your name, email, phone number, and some sensitive profile information (e.g., date of birth, income, college, place of employment, and smoking/drinking habits) from being exposed to web search engines and any other user on the platform
• Keep your photos from being exposed to web search engines (for ever) and also blurred out to other users as desired
• Find and review suitable matches
• View prospects' photos if their privacy settings allow it
• Shortlist and express interest in matches
• Send a SecureDial™ request to potential matches
• Reply to questions and messages sent by matches who have upgraded to a subscription plan
• Receive customer support via email or live chat

Value-added services start at ₹1,999 – for a Quick Connect plan, which allows you to initiate chat with matches. We also offer personalized services through an Assisted Connect plan.

Want to find someone from your own socio-cultural background?:
Jodi365 appeals to people of diverse religious views, whether it is Hindu, Muslim, Christian, Sikh, Jain, Buddhist, Parsi, or even no religion. Our users also come from various cultures, including: Bengali, Hindi, Gujarati, Kannadiga, Malayalee, Marathi, Oriya, Punjabi, Tamil, Telugu, and multi-cultural backgrounds.

One common denominator in our users, regardless of their socio-cultural background, is that they are drawn to Jodi365's tag line: For quality singles!

For more information, please browse https://www.jodi365.com or call us at +91 9345634365 (India) / +1 305-JODI365 (USA).

title: Jodi365: Indian matchmaking done right, since 2011

creator: Jodi365.com
descriptionHtml:
Jodi365 is a thoughtful, next-generation matchmaking platform that helps quality Indian singles to find the right match – whether they are ready for matrimony or shaadi in the near term, or want to date and get to know someone as friends first.

Jodi365 has been live and serving single Indians and their involved families, worldwide, since mid-2011.

It is a "freemium" app. What that means:
There are basic things that you can do on the app for free. Value-added services – with benefits that help users find and connect with the right partner sooner, whether for marriage or dating – are provided at additional cost.

Here's what all you can do for FREE:
• Keep your name, email, phone number, and some sensitive profile information (e.g., date of birth, income, college, place of employment, and smoking/drinking habits) from being exposed to web search engines and any other user on the platform
• Keep your photos from being exposed to search engines (or even random users) and also blurred out to other users as desired
• Find and review suitable matches
• View matches' photos if their privacy settings allow it
• Shortlist and express interest in matches
• Send a SecureDial™ request to matches, to talk without exposing phone numbers
• Reply to chats initiated by matches who have upgraded to a subscription plan
• Receive customer support via email or live chat

Value-added services start at ₹1,999 – for a Quick Connect plan, which allows you to initiate chat with matches.

We also offer personalized services, for those who may be more ready to tie the matrimonial knot in the near term, through an Assisted Connect plan.

As part of the concierge service, a dedicated relationship manager would:
• Understand you and your life-partner preferences in depth
• Curate and review up to 5 handpicked matches with you every week
• Reach out to preferred matches on your behalf & explore mutual interest and compatibility in time frames for marriage
• Make introductions as appropriate, facilitate a conversation, and arrange a meeting
• And provide support, through the matchmaking process, as a trusted intermediary

Want to find someone from your own socio-cultural background?:
You can. Jodi365 appeals to people of diverse religious views, or even no religion. Our users also represent all Indian cultures and native languages.

One common denominator in our users, regardless of their socio-cultural background, is that they are drawn to Jodi365's tag line: For quality singles!

Sign up today and get matched for free, once your profile has been manually screened and approved.

Whether you've found a match or wish to take a break at any time, you can have your profile temporarily hidden or even have your account deleted promptly, permanently.

We look forward to helping you find the right match on Jodi365, so that you won't need the app any more!

Jodi365 has been live and serving single Indians and their involved families, worldwide, since mid-2011.

It is a "freemium" app. What that means:
There are basic things that you can do on the app for free. Value-added services – with benefits that help users find and connect with the right partner sooner, whether for marriage or dating – are provided at additional cost.

Here's what all you can do for FREE:
• Keep your name, email, phone number, and some sensitive profile information (e.g., date of birth, income, college, place of employment, and smoking/drinking habits) from being exposed to web search engines and any other user on the platform
• Keep your photos from being exposed to search engines (or even random users) and also blurred out to other users as desired
• Find and review suitable matches
• View matches' photos if their privacy settings allow it
• Shortlist and express interest in matches
• Send a SecureDial™ request to matches, to talk without exposing phone numbers
• Reply to chats initiated by matches who have upgraded to a subscription plan
• Receive customer support via email or live chat

Value-added services start at ₹1,999 – for a Quick Connect plan, which allows you to initiate chat with matches.

We also offer personalized services, for those who may be more ready to tie the matrimonial knot in the near term, through an Assisted Connect plan.

As part of the concierge service, a dedicated relationship manager would:
• Understand you and your life-partner preferences in depth
• Curate and review up to 5 handpicked matches with you every week
• Reach out to preferred matches on your behalf & explore mutual interest and compatibility in time frames for marriage
• Make introductions as appropriate, facilitate a conversation, and arrange a meeting
• And provide support, through the matchmaking process, as a trusted intermediary

Want to find someone from your own socio-cultural background?:
You can. Jodi365 appeals to people of diverse religious views, or even no religion. Our users also represent all Indian cultures and native languages.

One common denominator in our users, regardless of their socio-cultural background, is that they are drawn to Jodi365's tag line: For quality singles!

Sign up today and get matched for free, once your profile has been manually screened and approved.

Whether you've found a match or wish to take a break at any time, you can have your profile temporarily hidden or even have your account deleted promptly, permanently.

We look forward to helping you find the right match on Jodi365, so that you won't need the app any more!
descriptionShort: Indian matchmaking done right. Unique hybrid of matrimony, shaadi & dating apps

Jodi365 is a thoughtful, next-generation matchmaking platform that helps quality Indian singles to find the right match – whether they are ready for matrimony or shaadi in the near term, or want to date and get to know someone as friends first.

Jodi365 has been live and serving single Indians and their involved families, worldwide, since mid-2011.

It is a "freemium" app. What that means:
There are basic things that you can do on the app for free. Value-added services – with benefits that help users find and connect with the right partner sooner, whether for marriage or dating – are provided at additional cost.

Here's what all you can do for FREE:
• Keep your name, email, phone number, and some sensitive profile information (e.g., date of birth, income, college, place of employment, and smoking/drinking habits) from being exposed to web search engines and any other user on the platform
• Keep your photos from being exposed to search engines (or even random users) and also blurred out to other users as desired
• Find and review suitable matches
• View matches' photos if their privacy settings allow it
• Shortlist and express interest in matches
• Send a SecureDial™ request to matches, to talk without exposing phone numbers
• Reply to chats initiated by matches who have upgraded to a subscription plan
• Receive customer support via email or live chat

Value-added services start at ₹1,999 – for a Quick Connect plan, which allows you to initiate chat with matches.

We also offer personalized services, for those who may be more ready to tie the matrimonial knot in the near term, through an Assisted Connect plan.

As part of the concierge service, a dedicated relationship manager would:
• Understand you and your life-partner preferences in depth
• Curate and review up to 5 handpicked matches with you every week
• Reach out to preferred matches on your behalf & explore mutual interest and compatibility in time frames for marriage
• Make introductions as appropriate, facilitate a conversation, and arrange a meeting
• And provide support, through the matchmaking process, as a trusted intermediary

Want to find someone from your own socio-cultural background?:
You can. Jodi365 appeals to people of diverse religious views, or even no religion. Our users also represent all Indian cultures and native languages.

One common denominator in our users, regardless of their socio-cultural background, is that they are drawn to Jodi365's tag line: For quality singles!

Sign up today and get matched for free, once your profile has been manually screened and approved.

Whether you've found a match or wish to take a break at any time, you can have your profile temporarily hidden or even have your account deleted promptly, permanently.

We look forward to helping you find the right match on Jodi365, so that you won't need the app any more!
descriptionShort: Indian matchmaking done right. Unique hybrid of matrimony, shaadi & dating apps

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Free 1-week trial of our Quick Connect plan (₹299 value) for new users who complete an authentic, video-verified profile
• A Notification Settings section, for granular control over what push & email notifications you wish to receive
• Easier access to customer support during the registration/onboarding process (through a Help icon embedded within the profile questionnaire)
• Assorted bug fixes and performance improvements, all in line with making a solid, much-appreciated app even better!

title: Jodi365: Next-gen matchmaking

creator: Jodi365.com
descriptionHtml:
Jodi365 is a next-generation matchmaking platform for quality Indian singles.

It is designed to help genuine people find the right match, at their own pace:
  • whether they are ready for matrimony or shaadi, or even an engagement, in the near term
  • or want to get to know someone as friends first

    Sign up today and get matched for free, once your profile has been manually screened and approved.

    PS: Genuine singles appreciate our rigorous screening process!

    Our story:
    As someone who had long endured the prevailing matrimonial and Indian dating sites into his 30s, our founder and CEO, Dr Anil Kumar deeply understood the challenges faced by educated, single professionals in finding a compatible partner.

    It is what motivated him, in the home stretch of his MBA program at Chicago Booth, to introduce a "refreshingly different" matchmaking app.

    That took the form of Jodi365, which we describe as:
    Conceived in Chicago. Created in Chennai. Catering to quality Indian singles worldwide.

    Jodi365 has been live and serving single Indians and their involved families since mid-2011. And we're pleased by how much it has been appreciated over the years!

    Our users come from India, the US, Canada, the UK, SE Asia, the Middle East, and other countries with sizable Indian / South Asian communities. Our largest market is, of course, India, particularly Tier 1 and Tier 2 metros, and, increasingly, Tier 3 towns too.

    Find someone from your own socio-cultural background:
    Jodi365 appeals to people of diverse religious views, or even no religion. Our users also represent all Indian communities and mother tongues.

    One common denominator in our users – regardless of their region, religion, native language, or community – is that they are drawn to Jodi365's tag line: For quality singles!

    Jodi365 is a "freemium" app. What that means:

    What all you can do for FREE:

    Value-added services – such as the ability to initiate chat with matches and talk to them without exposing phone numbers – start at ₹999 for a month-long Quick Connect plan.

    We also offer personalized services, for those who may be more ready to tie the matrimonial knot in the near term, through an Assisted Connect plan.

    • Make introductions as appropriate, facilitate a conversation, and arrange a meeting
    • And provide support, through the matchmaking process, as a trusted intermediary

    We look forward to helping you find your jodi on Jodi365, so that you won't need the app any more!

title: Jodi365: Matrimony, Shaadi App

creator: Jodi365.com
descriptionHtml:
Jodi365 is a next-generation matrimony app for quality Indian singles.

It is designed to help genuine people find the right match, at their own pace:
  • whether they are ready for matrimony or shaadi, or even an engagement, in the near term
  • or want to get to know someone special as friends first

    What differentiates Jodi365 from typical matrimonial & casual dating apps:
    • Jodi365 caters to quality singles – and is designed to weed out riff-raff!
    • Clear relationship goals & time frames for marriage – no need to guess a match's intentions
    • No frivolous browsing here – we don't indulge "time-pass" seekers
    • Unmatched privacy safeguards – no competing app takes privacy more seriously
    • Review mutually suitable matches – no need to search endlessly!
    • We match people, not merely profiles – and help to ensure true compatibility

    Sign up today and get matched for free, once your profile has been manually screened and approved.

    PS: Genuine singles appreciate our rigorous screening process!

    Our story:
    As someone who had long endured the prevailing matrimonial and Indian dating sites into his 30s, our founder and CEO, Dr Anil Kumar deeply understood the challenges faced by educated, single professionals in finding a compatible partner.

    It is what motivated him, in the home stretch of his MBA program at Chicago Booth, to introduce a "refreshingly different" matchmaking app.

    That took the form of Jodi365, which we describe as:
    Conceived in Chicago. Created in Chennai. Catering to quality Indian singles worldwide.

    Jodi365 has been live and serving single Indians and their involved families since mid-2011.

    And we're pleased by how Jodi365 has come to be appreciated as a smart, sensible hybrid between matrimony and dating apps.

    Our users are primarily from India, of course—particularly the Tier 1 and Tier 2 metros, and, increasingly, Tier 3 towns too.

    Yet, our user base also includes NRIs from the US, Canada, the UK, SE Asia, the Middle East, and other countries with sizable South Asian communities.

    Find someone from your own socio-cultural background:
    Jodi365 appeals to people of diverse religious views, or even no religion. Our users also represent all Indian communities and mother tongues.

    One common denominator in our users – regardless of their region, religion, native language, or community – is that they are drawn to Jodi365's tag line: For quality singles!

    Jodi365 is a "freemium" app. What that means:
    There are basic things that you can do on the app for free. Additional features, to help users find and connect with the right jodi sooner – whether for marriage or dating – are provided at additional cost.

    What all you can do for FREE:
    • Protect your name, email, phone number, and sensitive profile info from being exposed to web search engines and any other user
    • Keep your photos from being exposed to search engines – or even random users – and also blurred out to other users as desired

    • Find and review suitable matches
    • View matches' photos if their privacy settings allow it
    • Shortlist and express interest in matches

    • Send a SecureDial™ request to matches, to talk without exposing phone numbers
    • Reply to chats initiated by matches
    • Receive customer support via email or live chat

    Further, all users who create an authentic profile and complete the selfie-video verification step receive a complimentary week-long trial (₹299 value) of our Quick Connect plan.

    Value-added services – such as the ability to initiate chat with matches and talk to them without exposing phone numbers – start at ₹999.

    We also offer personalized services, in the form of expert assistance from a dedicated relationship manager, through an Assisted Connect plan.

    We look forward to helping you find your jodi on Jodi365, so that you won't need the app any more!

title: Jodi365: Modern Matrimony App

creator: Jodi365.com
descriptionHtml:
Jodi365 is a next-generation matrimony app for quality Indian singles.

It is designed to help genuine people find the right match, at their own pace:
  • whether they are ready for matrimony or shaadi, or even an engagement, in the near term
  • or want to get to know someone special as friends first

    What differentiates Jodi365 from typical matrimonial & casual dating apps:
    • Jodi365 caters to quality singles – and is designed to weed out riff-raff!
    • Clear relationship goals & time frames for marriage – no need to guess a match's intentions
    • No frivolous browsing here – we don't indulge "time-pass" seekers
    • Unmatched privacy safeguards – no competing app takes privacy more seriously
    • Review mutually suitable matches – no need to search endlessly!
    • We match people, not merely profiles – and help to ensure true compatibility

    Sign up today and get matched for free, once your profile has been manually screened and approved.

    PS: Genuine singles appreciate our rigorous screening process!

    Our story:
    As someone who had long endured the prevailing matrimonial and Indian dating sites into his 30s, our founder and CEO, Dr Anil Kumar deeply understood the challenges faced by educated, single professionals in finding a compatible partner.

    It is what motivated him, in the home stretch of his MBA program at Chicago Booth, to introduce a "refreshingly different" matchmaking app.

    That took the form of Jodi365, which we describe as:
    Conceived in Chicago. Created in Chennai. Catering to quality Indian singles worldwide.

    Jodi365 has been live and serving single Indians and their involved families since mid-2011.

    And we're pleased by how Jodi365 has come to be appreciated as a smart, sensible hybrid between matrimony and dating apps.

    Our users are primarily from India, of course—particularly the Tier 1 and Tier 2 metros, and, increasingly, Tier 3 towns too.

    Yet, our user base also includes NRIs from the US, Canada, the UK, SE Asia, the Middle East, and other countries with sizable South Asian communities.

    Find someone from your own socio-cultural background:
    Jodi365 appeals to people of diverse religious views, or even no religion. Our users also represent all Indian communities and mother tongues.

    One common denominator in our users – regardless of their region, religion, native language, or community – is that they are drawn to Jodi365's tag line: For quality singles!

    Jodi365 is a "freemium" app. What that means:
    There are basic things that you can do on the app for free. Additional features, to help users find and connect with the right jodi sooner – whether for marriage or dating – are provided at additional cost.

    What all you can do for FREE:
    • Protect your name, email, phone number, and sensitive profile info from being exposed to web search engines and any other user
    • Keep your photos from being exposed to search engines – or even random users – and also blurred out to other users as desired

    • Find and review suitable matches
    • View matches' photos if their privacy settings allow it
    • Shortlist and express interest in matches

    • Send a SecureDial™ request to matches, to talk without exposing phone numbers
    • Reply to chats initiated by matches
    • Receive customer support via email or live chat

    Further, all users who create an authentic profile and complete the selfie-video verification step receive a complimentary week-long trial (₹299 value) of our Quick Connect plan.

    Value-added services – such as the ability to initiate chat with matches and talk to them without exposing phone numbers – start at ₹999.

    We also offer personalized services, in the form of expert assistance from a dedicated relationship manager, through an Assisted Connect plan.

    We look forward to helping you find your jodi on Jodi365, so that you won't need the app any more!

    • Review mutually suitable matches – no need to search endlessly!

    Our story:
    As someone who had long endured the prevailing matrimonial and Indian dating sites into his 30s, our founder and CEO, Dr Anil Kumar deeply understood the challenges faced by educated, single professionals in finding a compatible partner.

    It is what motivated him, in the home stretch of his MBA program at Chicago Booth, to introduce a "refreshingly different" matchmaking app.

    That took the form of Jodi365, which we describe as:
    Conceived in Chicago. Created in Chennai. Catering to quality Indian singles worldwide.

    Jodi365 has been live and serving single Indians and their involved families since mid-2011.

    And we're pleased by how Jodi365 has come to be appreciated as a smart, sensible hybrid between matrimony and dating apps.

    Our users are primarily from India, of course—particularly the Tier 1 and Tier 2 metros, and, increasingly, Tier 3 towns too.

    Yet, our user base also includes NRIs from the US, Canada, the UK, SE Asia, the Middle East, and other countries with sizable South Asian communities.

    Find someone from your own socio-cultural background:

title: Jodi365: Modern Matrimony App

creator: Jodi365.com
descriptionHtml:
Jodi365 is a next-generation matrimony app for quality Indian singles.

It is designed to help genuine people find the right match, at their own pace:
  • whether they are ready for matrimony or shaadi, or even an engagement, in the near term
  • or want to get to know someone special as friends first

    What differentiates Jodi365 from typical matrimonial & casual dating apps:
    • Jodi365 caters to quality singles – and is designed to weed out riff-raff!
    • Clear relationship goals & time frames for marriage – no need to guess a match's intentions
    • No frivolous browsing here – we don't indulge "time-pass" seekers
    • Unmatched privacy safeguards – no competing app takes privacy more seriously
    • Review mutually suitable matches – no need to search endlessly!
    • We match people, not merely profiles – and help to ensure true compatibility

    Sign up today and get matched for free, once your profile has been manually screened and approved.

    PS: Genuine singles appreciate our rigorous screening process!

    Our story:
    As someone who had long endured the prevailing matrimonial and Indian dating sites into his 30s, our founder and CEO, Dr Anil Kumar deeply understood the challenges faced by educated, single professionals in finding a compatible partner.

    It is what motivated him, in the home stretch of his MBA program at Chicago Booth, to introduce a "refreshingly different" matchmaking app.

    That took the form of Jodi365, which we describe as:
    Conceived in Chicago. Created in Chennai. Catering to quality Indian singles worldwide.

    Jodi365 has been live and serving single Indians and their involved families since 2011.

    And we're pleased by how Jodi365 has come to be appreciated as a smart, sensible hybrid between matrimony and dating apps.

    Our users are primarily from India, of course—particularly the Tier 1 and Tier 2 metros, and, increasingly, Tier 3 towns too.

    Yet, our user base also includes NRIs from the US, Canada, the UK, SE Asia, the Middle East, and other countries with sizable South Asian communities.

    Find someone from your own socio-cultural background:
    Jodi365 appeals to people of diverse religious views, or even no religion. Our users also represent all Indian communities and mother tongues.

    One common denominator in our users – regardless of their region, religion, native language, or community – is that they are drawn to Jodi365's tag line: For quality singles!

    Jodi365 is a "freemium" app. What that means:
    There are basic things that you can do on the app for free. Additional features, to help users find and connect with the right jodi sooner – whether for marriage or dating – are provided at additional cost.

    What all you can do for FREE:
    • Protect your name, email, phone number, and sensitive profile info from being exposed to web search engines and any other user
    • Keep your photos from being exposed to search engines – or even random users – and also blurred out to other users as desired

    • Find and review suitable matches
    • View matches' photos if their privacy settings allow it
    • Express interest in appealing matches

    • Send a SecureDial™ request to matches, to talk without exposing phone numbers
    • Reply to chats initiated by matches
    • Receive customer support via email or live chat

    Value-added services – such as the ability to initiate chat with matches and talk to them without exposing phone numbers – start at ₹999.

    We also offer personalized services, in the form of expert assistance from a dedicated human matchmaker, through an Assisted Connect plan.

    We look forward to helping you find your jodi on Jodi365, so that you won't need the app any more!

title: Jodi365: Modern Matrimony App

creator: Jodi365.com
descriptionHtml:
Jodi365 is an exclusive matchmaking app for singles who are alumni of top colleges and universities. Because quality matters.

What differentiates Jodi365 from typical matrimonial & casual dating apps:

Jodi365 is a smart, sensible hybrid between matrimonial sites and dating apps, designed to help elite singles to find the right match at their own pace:
  • whether they are ready for matrimony or shaadi, or even an engagement, in the near term
  • or want to get to know someone special as friends first

    We carefully screen each applicant and are selective about whom we let into our curated community of verified members.

    Our members are predominantly graduates of not just the IITs, IIMs, and the Ivy Leagues. They come from elite institutions in varied fields, including the arts, science, civil services, engineering, medicine, law, management, business, account, finance, marketing, design, media, and more.

    Our story, in the words of our founder and CEO:

    "I have personally known the challenges that educated, driven career professionals face in finding a compatible partner. That is what motivated me, in the home stretch of my MBA program at Chicago Booth, in 2009, to provide a thoughtful, refreshingly different matchmaking service.

    I am grateful for how much Jodi365 has grown since then and for its continuing to earn the trust of thousands of new users each month."

    – S. Anil Kumar
    U Chicago (MBA), U Michigan (PhD), U Iowa (MS), IIT Madras (BTech)

    Our users are primarily from India, of course—particularly Tier 1 and Tier 2 metros and, increasingly, Tier 3 towns too.

    Yet, our user base also includes NRIs and hyphenated Indians from the US, Canada, the UK, SE Asia, the Middle East, and other countries with sizable South Asian communities.

    Find someone from your own socio-cultural background:

    Jodi365 appeals to people of diverse religious views, or even no religion. Our users also represent all Indian communities and mother tongues.

    One common denominator in our users – regardless of their region, religion, native language, or community – is that they are drawn to Jodi365's tag line: For quality singles!

    They are also serious about finding that special someone.

    If you are, too, and fit our eligibility criteria, then you are welcome to apply to join our exclusive community.

    Genuine singles appreciate our detailed profile questionnaire and rigorous screening process. They also appreciate our principle, "You own your data. We respect that." (Our business model is based on member subscriptions and doesn't involve renting or sharing user data. Further, if an applicant is not approved or when a member no longer needs our services, we retain no personally identifiable information.)

    Jodi365 is unabashedly a premium app, designed with care for those who value quality over quantity, for discerning singles who appreciate that choosing a life partner is the most important decision one can make in life.

    Yet, we invite screened and verified members to get a free taste of our services before deciding on a membership plan, which starts at ₹9,600.

    Why people trust and feel safe on Jodi365:

    We strive to admit only educated, quality singles, protect your privacy, and help to keep you safe.

    Our discreet approach to matchmaking (see our app listing gallery here and details at Jodi365.com) is, not surprisingly, heartening and reassuring to genuine singles who are fed up of fake profiles and randos on other apps and also to "high-visibility" professionals and HNIs who don't even want to be spotted online.

    We also offer personalized services, for busy and/or discriminating individuals who would welcome expert assistance from a dedicated relationship manager. (The service entails our presenting handpicked matches for your review, getting more background info on prospects, and personally introducing you to matches, as appropriate.)

    We look forward to helping you find your jodi on Jodi365, so that you won't need the app any more!
descriptionShort: Matrimony & dating app—since 2011—exclusively for alumni of top universities.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Jodi365 is now exclusively for singles who are alumni of top colleges/universities. We have modified our app and membership plans accordingly.

New users need to provide copies of their valid photo ID and degrees (for our internal verification only) to gain access to our curated community of verified members.

To improve the user experience, we have also fixed assorted bugs and made continued design improvements.

Do let us know, via the in-app Contact Us form, how we can serve you better.

    Yet, we invite screened and verified members to get a free taste of our services before deciding on a membership plan, which starts at ₹9,600.

    Why people trust and feel safe on Jodi365:

    We strive to admit only educated, quality singles, protect your privacy, and help to keep you safe.

    Our discreet approach to matchmaking (see our app listing gallery here and details at Jodi365.com) is, not surprisingly, heartening and reassuring to genuine singles who are fed up of fake profiles and randos on other apps and also to "high-visibility" professionals and HNIs who don't even want to be spotted online.

    We also offer personalized services, for busy and/or discriminating individuals who would welcome expert assistance from a dedicated relationship manager.     We look forward to helping you find your jodi on Jodi365, so that you won't need the app any more!

title:
Jodi365: Intelligent Matrimony
2.2.53

creator: Jodi365.com
descriptionHtml:
Jodi365 is an exclusive matchmaking app for singles who are alumni of top colleges and universities. Because quality matters.

What differentiates Jodi365 from typical matrimonial & casual dating apps:

Jodi365 is a smart, sensible hybrid between matrimonial sites and dating apps, designed to help elite singles to find the right match at their own pace:
  • whether they are ready for matrimony or shaadi, or even an engagement, in the near term
  • or want to get to know someone special as friends first

    We carefully screen each applicant and are selective about whom we let into our curated community of verified members.

    Our members are predominantly graduates of not just the IITs, IIMs, and the Ivy Leagues. They come from elite institutions in varied fields, including the arts, science, civil services, engineering, medicine, law, management, business, account, finance, marketing, design, media, and more.

    Our story, in the words of our founder and CEO:

    "I have personally known the challenges that educated, driven career professionals face in finding a compatible partner. That is what motivated me, in the home stretch of my MBA program at Chicago Booth, in 2009, to provide a thoughtful, refreshingly different matchmaking service.

    I am grateful for how much Jodi365 has grown since then and for its continuing to earn the trust of thousands of new users each month."

    – S. Anil Kumar
    U Chicago (MBA), U Michigan (PhD), U Iowa (MS), IIT Madras (BTech)

    Our users are primarily from India, of course—particularly Tier 1 and Tier 2 metros and, increasingly, Tier 3 towns too.

    Yet, our user base also includes NRIs and hyphenated Indians from the US, Canada, the UK, SE Asia, the Middle East, and other countries with sizable South Asian communities.

    Find someone from your own socio-cultural background:

    Jodi365 appeals to people of diverse religious views, or even no religion. Our users also represent all Indian communities and mother tongues.

    One common denominator in our users – regardless of their region, religion, native language, or community – is that they are drawn to Jodi365's tag line: For quality singles!

    They are also serious about finding that special someone.

    If you are, too, and fit our eligibility criteria, then you are welcome to apply to join our exclusive community.

    Genuine singles appreciate our detailed profile questionnaire and rigorous screening process. They also appreciate our principle, "You own your data. We respect that." (Our business model is based on member subscriptions and doesn't involve renting or sharing user data. Further, if an applicant is not approved or when a member no longer needs our services, we retain no personally identifiable information.)

    Jodi365 is unabashedly a premium app, designed with care for those who value quality over quantity, for discerning singles who appreciate that choosing a life partner is the most important decision one can make in life.

    Yet, we invite screened and verified members to get a free taste of our services before deciding on a membership plan, which starts at ₹9,600.

Jodi365 is a smart, sensible hybrid between matrimonial sites and dating apps, designed to help elite singles to find the right match at their own pace:
  • whether they are ready for matrimony or shaadi, or even an engagement, in the near term
  • or want to get to know someone special as friends first

    We carefully screen each applicant and are selective about whom we let into our curated community of verified members.

    Our members are predominantly graduates of not just the IITs, IIMs, and the Ivy Leagues. They come from elite institutions in varied fields, including the arts, science, civil services, engineering, medicine, law, management, business, account, finance, marketing, design, media, and more.

    Our story, in the words of our founder and CEO:

    "I have personally known the challenges that educated, driven career professionals face in finding a compatible partner. That is what motivated me, in the home stretch of my MBA program at Chicago Booth, in 2009, to provide a thoughtful, refreshingly different matchmaking service.

    I am grateful for how much Jodi365 has grown since then and for its continuing to earn the trust of thousands of new users each month."

    – S. Anil Kumar
    U Chicago (MBA), U Michigan (PhD), U Iowa (MS), IIT Madras (BTech)

    Our users are primarily from India, of course—particularly Tier 1 and Tier 2 metros and, increasingly, Tier 3 towns too.

    Yet, our user base also includes NRIs and hyphenated Indians from the US, Canada, the UK, SE Asia, the Middle East, and other countries with sizable South Asian communities.

    Find someone from your own socio-cultural background:

    Jodi365 appeals to people of diverse religious views, or even no religion. Our users also represent all Indian communities and mother tongues.

    One common denominator in our users – regardless of their region, religion, native language, or community – is that they are drawn to Jodi365's tag line: For quality singles!

    They are also serious about finding that special someone.

    If you are, too, and fit our eligibility criteria, then you are welcome to apply to join our exclusive community.

    Genuine singles appreciate our detailed profile questionnaire and rigorous screening process. They also appreciate our principle, "You own your data. We respect that." (Our business model is based on member subscriptions and doesn't involve renting or sharing user data. Further, if an applicant is not approved or when a member no longer needs our services, we retain no personally identifiable information.)

    Jodi365 is unabashedly a premium app, designed with care for those who value quality over quantity, for discerning singles who appreciate that choosing a life partner is the most important decision one can make in life.

    Yet, we invite screened and verified members to get a free taste of our services before deciding on a membership plan, which starts at ₹9,600.

    Why people trust and feel safe on Jodi365:

    We strive to admit only educated, quality singles, protect your privacy, and help to keep you safe.

    Our discreet approach to matchmaking (see our app listing gallery here and details at Jodi365.com) is, not surprisingly, heartening and reassuring to genuine singles who are fed up of fake profiles and randos on other apps and also to "high-visibility" professionals and HNIs who don't even want to be spotted online.

    We also offer personalized services, for busy and/or discriminating individuals who would welcome expert assistance from a dedicated relationship manager. (The service entails our presenting handpicked matches for your review, getting more background info on prospects, and personally introducing you to matches, as appropriate.)

    We look forward to helping you find your jodi on Jodi365, so that you won't need the app any more!
descriptionShort: Matrimony & dating app—since 2011—exclusively for alumni of fine universities.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Jodi365 is now exclusively for singles who are alumni of top colleges/universities. We have modified our app and membership plans accordingly.

New users need to provide copies of their valid photo ID and degrees (for our internal verification only) to gain access to our curated community of verified members.

To improve the user experience, we have also fixed assorted bugs and made continued design improvements.

Do let us know, via the in-app Contact Us form, how we can serve you better.
